009package Ch11_CirclesAndEllipses;
010
011//import Fitting.Display;
012import ij.IJ;
013import ij.ImagePlus;
014import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
015import ij.gui.Overlay;
016import ij.io.LogStream;
017import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
018import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
019import imagingbook.common.color.sets.BasicAwtColor;
020import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
021import imagingbook.common.geometry.circle.GeometricCircle;
022import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic.CircleFitAlgebraic;
023import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic.CircleFitAlgebraic.FitType;
024import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
025import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
026import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
027import imagingbook.common.math.PrintPrecision;
028
029public class Circle_Fit_Algebraic_Image implements PlugInFilter {
030        
031        static {
032                LogStream.redirectSystem();
033                PrintPrecision.set(6);
034        }
035        
036        private static CircleFitAlgebraic.FitType algType = FitType.Pratt;
037        private static boolean ShowFittedCircle = true;
038        private static BasicAwtColor CircleColor = BasicAwtColor.Red;
039        private static double StrokeWidth = 1.0;
040        
041        private ImagePlus im;
042        
043        @Override
044        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
045                this.im = im;
046                return DOES_ALL;
047        }
048
049        @Override
050        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
051                
052                if (!runDialog()) {
053                        return;
054                }
055                
056                Pnt2d[] points = IjUtils.collectNonzeroPoints(ip);
057                
058                IJ.log("Found points " + points.length);
059                if (points.length < 3) {
060                        IJ.error("At least 3 points are required, found only " + points.length);
061                }
062                
063                // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
064                CircleFitAlgebraic fitter = CircleFitAlgebraic.getFit(algType, points);
065                // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
066                
067                GeometricCircle fitCircle = fitter.getGeometricCircle();
068                if (fitCircle == null) {
069                        IJ.log("Algebraic fit: no result!");
070                        return;
071                }
072                IJ.log("  fit: " + fitCircle);
073                
074//              IJ.log(String.format(Locale.US, "  error real = %.3f", realCircle.getMeanSquareError(points)));
075//              IJ.log(String.format(Locale.US, "  error fit  = %.3f", fitCircle.getMeanSquareError(points)));
076
077
078                // ----- draw fitted circle ----------------------------------
079                if (ShowFittedCircle) {
080                        Overlay oly = im.getOverlay();
081                        if (oly == null) {
082                                oly = new Overlay();
083                                im.setOverlay(oly);
084                        }
085                        ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter(oly);
086                        ColoredStroke outerStroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, CircleColor.getColor());
087                        ola.addShapes(fitCircle.getShapes(3), outerStroke);
088                }
089                im.show();
090        }
091
092        
093        // ------------------------------------------
094        
095        private boolean runDialog() {
096                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
097                gd.addEnumChoice("fit method", algType);
098                gd.addCheckbox("show fitted circle", ShowFittedCircle);
099                gd.addEnumChoice("circle color", CircleColor);
100                
101                gd.showDialog();
102                if (gd.wasCanceled())
103                        return false;
104                
105                algType = gd.getNextEnumChoice(CircleFitAlgebraic.FitType.class);
106                ShowFittedCircle = gd.getNextBoolean();
107                CircleColor = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
108                
109                return true;
110        }
111        
112}
